memberdef.argsstring: (const TString &fileName, int energy, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitMeansP, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitMeansHe, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitErrorsP, std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitErrorsHe)
memberdef.name: ProcessFile

briefdescription.para: Processes a ROOT file to extract fit results for protons and helium.

detaileddescription.para: This function processes a ROOT file containing fit results for protons and helium. It extracts the mean and error values for each fit and stores them in the provided maps.

parameterdescription.para: The name of the ROOT file to process.
The energy value associated with the file.
A map to store the mean fit values for protons.
A map to store the mean fit values for helium.
A map to store the fit errors for protons.
A map to store the fit errors for helium.

memberdef.argsstring: (const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitMeansP, const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitErrorsP, const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitMeansHe, const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &fitErrorsHe, const std::map< int, double > &elossP, const std::map< int, double > &elossHe)
memberdef.name: PlotFitResultsCombined

param.type: const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &
const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &
const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &
const std::map< TString, std::map< int, double > > &

briefdescription.para: Plots the combined fit results for protons and helium.

detaileddescription.para: This function plots the combined fit results for protons and helium. It creates graphs for the fit results and performs a combined fit with a linear function. The fit values are stored in a map and returned.

parameterdescription.para: A map containing the mean fit values for protons.
A map containing the fit errors for protons.
A map containing the mean fit values for helium.
A map containing the fit errors for helium.
A map containing the energy loss values for protons.
A map containing the energy loss values for helium.

simplesect.para: A map containing the fit values for each layer-bar combination.

briefdescription.para: Writes the fit values to a configuration file.

detaileddescription.para: This function writes the fit values to a configuration file. The fit values are sorted by bar ID and written to the file in a specific format.

parameterdescription.para: A map containing the fit values for each layer-bar combination.

briefdescription.para: Rounds a measurement value and its uncertainty.

detaileddescription.para: This function rounds a measurement value and its uncertainty to the appropriate number of significant figures. The uncertainty is rounded to 1 significant figure.

simplesect.para: A pair with the rounded value and uncertainty.
